name: Flip a coinllection TTRPG collection
description:
Flip a coinllection is a TTRPG collection  containing 4 business card games that can be played using only the card and a coin.

This collection brings a new TTRPG: Time to transform, a tokusatsu business card game!

In this collection you will find the following games:

  • Adventurer's mission
  • Heirs of the world
  • Time to Transform!
  • Yes, my master!

All games are avaliable in english and Brazilian portuguese.
